Comment.Language: For the Feast of the Nativity:

Text.Language: All/louia all/louia: I/couc Pi,~rictoc Ps/ri m~V] acmacf n~je ]paryenoc qen B/yleem n~te ]Ioudea kata nic~m/ m~p~rou/tikon: all/louia: all/louia.
Alleluia, Alleluia. / Jesus Christ the Son of God / was born of the Virgin in Bethlehem of Judea / according to the prophetic voices. Alleluia, Alleluia.
